title: WEN Tea Tree Cleansing Conditioner 6 Oz.
description: WEN Tea Tree Cleansing Conditioner 6 Oz.

title: WEN® Sweet Almond Mint Cleansing Conditioner 16oz
description: Sweet Almond Mint is the perfect balance of nourishing herbs and natural ingredients designed to hydrate and replenish hair that has been damaged due to shampoo and other harsh elements. May be used as often as necessary, it thoroughly cleanses hair and scalp without stripping them of their natural oils, providing it with added moisture, strength and sheen.

title: WEN by Chaz Dean Sweet Almond Mint Styling Creme 4 oz
description: Instead of using a gel for hold and a polishing gloss for shine, now you can achieve both with one product: WEN Styling Crme. This creamy, softhold formula is designed to promote moisture, enhance shine and boost body. Even better: hair treated with this protective potion was up to 80% stronger against heat styling stress than untreated hair. *Tested against untreated hair.
